Package KI305_Leshkovych_Lab3

Class VideoPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • KI305_Leshkovych_Lab3.VideoPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VideoRecorder
    public abstract class VideoPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class VideoPlayer describes the functionality of a video player. The video player manages the screen, speakers, and remote control, as well as logging actions performed.
